model

Class AnimalEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.AnimalEntity

  • public class AnimalEntity
extends java.lang.Object
    Animal entity class holds the position and direction of a specific entity and also its variable food level. While animations held in Animal, they are accessed from here because specific entity direction and alive/death set here
